description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Force your enemies into your lethal StarTrail in this galactic arena game. Use items to do loops, quick turns, emit rainbow trails and more! Play against your friends on XBox Live or against computer controller bots, complete singleplayer challanges and beat your friends at the highscore! 5 different game types, including Drawing Mode where you and your friends can paint with your trail.
